...你個wordpess係咪自己係server 用nginx 搭建？
定係用佢本身嗰個？
自己server 裝返個php先
<!DOCTYPE html>
<head>
<title>make friend</title>
</head>
<body>
<form action="mail_handler.php" method="post">
First Name: <input type="text" name="first_name"><br>
Last Name: <input type="text" name="last_name"><br>
Email: <input type="text" name="email"><br>
Message:<br><textarea rows="5" name="message" cols="30"></textarea><br>
<input type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit">
</form>
</body>
</html>

Php幫你寫左一半
<?php
if(isset($_POST['submit'])){
$to = "email@example.com"; // this is user's Email address
$from = $_POST['email']; // this is the sender's Email address
$first_name = $_POST['first_name'];
$last_name = $_POST['last_name'];
$subject = "Form submission";
$subject2 = "Copy of your form submission";
$message = $first_name . " " . $last_name . " wrote the following:" . "\n\n" . $_POST['message'];
$message2 = "Here is a copy of your message " . $first_name . "\n\n" . $_POST['message'];
$headers = "From:" . $from;
$headers2 = "From:" . $to;
mail($to,$subject,$message,$headers);
mail($from,$subject2,$message2,$headers2); // sends a copy of the message to the sender
echo " Sent. Thank you " . $first_name . ", make friend.";

Now, the problem is how you get the current user's email address who posted a article.
Wordpress stores users' information with mysql. The simple way is to use SQL(just simply select from) and assign the value it returns to variable $to

Node.js is better.
But php mixes build-in mysql not bad lahh.
